item.title: Reflecting on 2025
item.description: In no particular order - a reflection on the year 2025. Spit into a few different areas of life. Biggest and easily the most exciting update (currently redacted)! If you’re reading this, I guess I’ve decided to share it (or you’ve done something bad and should be ashamed). Here’s to another one! Some cool “wrapped” shares / stats: Github Wrapped: https://git-wrapped.com/profiles/Heathhenley Goodreads year in books: https://www.goodreads.com/user/year_in_books/2025/33307498 According to Spotify my music age is 66 lol.
